title: So I just watched the Ornn Teaser Trailer and I got a few questions
body:
1. Is the woman singing the same voice as the one from the Diana Login? If so, Bro she needs to sing more omg....
2. What language is that sung in? Is that ancient Freljordian?
3. The way it sounds makes me think of Skyrim, so is Ornn a Dragonborn? (Fus-Ro-Dah-ing on the rift plz)
and finally...
4. I happened to come across this while searching the Universe pages, but it isn't shown on the main page. Is it supposed to be hidden?

replies.body:
Rioter Talondor answered your first question here:  https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/mKFauMhA-oh-boy?comment=000600000001

The vocalist is Christine Hals.

And yes you're exactly right - it's Ancient Freljordian!

This video is a teaser - Ornn doesn't have a spot on Universe quite yet :)  Soon, I'm sure.
Man, her husband is a very lucky dude. A woman with that voice.., I would let her talk/sing me to sleep every day. xD
